name: BaW-Demo
description:
This is a Demo of my future Game. It's a 2d unity game where you control a little player, you try to avoid ennemies coming to you, and you try to have as much as HP as possible. 

Things to know : 

 - the default keys are ZQSD, but you can change them in the options : 

               - while holding the key on your keyboard, press the button you want to change 

 - hitting an ennemy (the white diamonds shapes) make you loose one HP

 - taking the weird looking hexagons give you one HP
